title: Opening of 6th Daffodil Captain Cup Golf Tournament 2023
description: Dhaka, November 03, 2023: Lt. Gen. Ataul Hakim Sarwar Hasan, SBP, SGP, ndc, afwc, psc, PhD, Chief of General Staff of Bangladesh Army inaugurated 3-day long ‘6th Daffodil Captain Cup Golf Tournament 2023’ as Chief Guest at Kurmitola Golf Club (KGC) in the city in the morning on Friday, 03 November 2023. The tee-off was witnessed among others by Dr.  Md.  Sabur Khan, Chairman, Dr. Mohammad Nuruzzaman, Chief Executive Officer of Daffodil Family, Major General Md. Zahirul Islam, , SGP, ndc, , psc, Master General of the ordnance of Bangladesh Army and Vice President, Kurmitola Golf Club, Brigadier General Md. Mahabubus Samad Chowdhury, BSP, ndc, psc, Club Captain, Kurmitola Golf Club, Brigadier General Abidur Reza Khan (Retd), Chairman, Tournament Committee, Kurmitola Golf Club, Dr. Nadir Bin Ali, Registrar, Major Arman Ali Bhuyan (Retd.), Project Director (Development) of Daffodil International University, all the executive  committee members , Colonel Md. Shahidul Haque (Rtd.), CEO, KGC, Lieutenant Colonel Abu Md. Sayedur Rahman ( Rtd.)-General Manager, Club Affairs, KGC, Lieutenant Colonel Md. Anwar Hossain (Rtd.), GM ( Golf Operations) KGC were also present in the inaugural ceremony. Members of the Daffodil Family and high officials of KGC were also preent in the inaugural ceremony.  In different categories a total 650 Golfer both Male and Female from home and abroad took part in the tournament.

title: AWS Cloud Day Bangladesh 2023 will be held on June 17 for the first time in Bangladesh
description: AWS Cloud Day Bangladesh 2023 has been going to be organized on June 17, 2023 for the first time in Bangladesh. This full-day event aims to provide participants with hands-on workshops, on building cloud- native applications and machine learning as well as insights on recipe for  creating the next generation of unicorn startups, and opportunities to learn about AWS career programs through various sessions conducted by internationally and locally recognized professionals/trainers from Amazon Web Services (AWS). The daylong event also have the opportunity to learn about career programs offered by AWS and network with subject matter experts, national leaders, teachers and cloud enthusiasts from all over Bangladesh.

title: QS World University Rankings-2024: DIU Attains Esteemed Position
description: Daffodil International University (DIU) has been ranked for its excellence in education and research in the QS World University Rankings 2024. The highly regarded rankings, released on June 27, 2023, have positioned DIU in the range of 1201-1400 among the 1499 universities assessed worldwide this year. Furthermore, DIU has been acknowledged as a Highly Research-Intensive University. DIU placed third among private universities and fifth among all fifteen universities ranked from Bangladesh, this year.

title: Web developer
description: If a dog chews shoes whose shoes does he choose? ChatGPT is a natural language processing tool driven by AI technology that allows you to have human-like conversations and much more with the chatbot. The language model can answer questions and assist you with tasks, such as composing emails, essays, and code
